attr.title: Koboo: The Tree Spirit
attr.desc: Koboo is a fast paced action rogue-lite platformer where you battle against towering hunters as a small tree spirit by attacking their weak points. Forge powerful synergies, explore the Ancient Forest's branching paths, fish, catch bugs and garden to rebuild your home!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. This game requires a device with 2GB RAM.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/718190/Koboo_The_Tree_Spirit/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder. This game requires a device with `2GB` RAM.
